The Vacationers follows an American family on a two-week vacation in Mallorca, Spain. The daughter in the family, Sylvia, is eighteen and has just graduated from high school. You will see thing don’t start smoothly for her…

description: The Vacationers follows an American family on a two-week vacation in Mallorca, Spain. The daughter in the family, Sylvia, is eighteen and has just graduated from high school. You will see thing don’t start smoothly for her…
contentencoded: The Vacationers follows an American family on a two-week vacation in Mallorca, Spain. The daughter in the family, Sylvia, is eighteen and has just graduated from high school. You will see thing don’t start smoothly for her…
teaser: The Vacationers follows an American family on a two-week vacation in Mallorca, Spain. The daughter in the family, Sylvia, is eighteen and has just graduated from high school. You will see thing don’t start smoothly for her…
title: Emma Straub Takes Us on Vacation
